(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:17 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Vtopmart is dedicated to creating a better home life for every family.

Our Vision:

To pursue a better life and enjoy it, we are committed to providing various well-designed, high-quality, practically household products with fashionable concepts and innovative design to make your home full of warmth and love.

Vtopmart Drawer Organizer

Explore More Categories

Fit Multi Occasions

Make Everything Organized —- These clear versatile drawer dividers trays are perfect for any place in your home. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity / bathroom / kitchen / office drawers, ideal for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, jewelry, office supplies, craft supplies, utensils, etc.
Combination of 4 Different Sizes —- One set includes 25pcs storage bins in 4 different sizes, which makes you can customize combinations to store items and organize drawer for your specific needs. Includes: 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs), 9 x 3x 2 inches(6pcs), 6 x 3 x 2 inches(8pcs), 3 x 3 x 2 inches(8cps).
Non-Slip and Durable —- Extra 200pcs silicone pads are included, just stick them on the bottom of the plastic trays for non-slip. Made of durable and clear plastic, so you can see what’s in it without digging around or making a mess, help you get a neat lifestyle.
Stackable Design —- Organize all your items and then stack these bins into one other, that will save much space especially when you have a narrow drawer. Use these trays to separate your messy drawer, you will find it’s so easy to keep things neat and tidy.
Easy to Clean —- Our desk drawer storage bins are easy to be wiped clean with a damp cloth and perfect for keeping everything in its place. Convenient for use in your daily life, make everything look beautiful and better organized.

Read more

4 Size Combination

Variety of sizes help make the organization of different items more flexible and easier. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity, bathroom, kitchen and office drawers

Non-Slip Design

Silicone pads at the bottom of the bin prevent the box from moving when dragging the drawer, always keep things in their own place.

Built to Last

Made of durable and transparent plastic, built to last. Clear bins make you can see everything in them when pulling a stack of them out of a drawer.

Package Include:

  • 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs)
  • 9 x 3x 2 inches (6pcs)
  • 6 x 3 x 2 inches (8pcs)
  • 3 x 3 x 2 inches (8cps)

Read more

Multi Purpose

Organize Makeup

Fit perfectly for your vanity drawer, for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, nail polish, and more.

Organize Office Supplies

Convenient for storing small items such as pencils, stationery and so on, helping you to save space. Make your desk look more neatly and cleanly.

Organize Kitchen Utensils

Ideal for organizing forks, spoons, steak knives in your kitchen, allow you to keep everything handy for meal prep and cooking.

Read more

JUSTTOP Car Steering Wheel Desk, Travel Car Accessories, Car Stand Trays for Eating, Multipurpose Car Steering Wheel Desk Tray Table(Black)
Versatility: The smart two-in-one design has a stylish black gorgeous shape and can match most cars. With a cup holder and a multi-purpose flat structure, the car pallet precisely uses very little space. This is the most convenient and practical. In addition, it can easily support a laptop tablet or iPad.
A must have: The multi-function steering wheel tray is ideal for long-distance travel, computers, business travel, and leisure use. It is also very suitable for traveling by car, especially for families with children.
High quality: The portable car tray is made of high quality ABS material, designed to fit the steering wheel of most vehicles, is sturdy and durable.
Easy to install: Simply hook the car tray to your steering wheel from the buttom and you’ve got an instant ergonomic desk. Easy to clean, easy to store and you can put it in the back pocket when not in use.
Purchase with Confidence: Any issues or questions please feel free to contact us, we are always here to satisfy all of you.

4
Price: $17.99 - $11.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Take Control of Your Workspace and Always Find What You Need with these collapsible parts trays!

Perfect for most any use the Sandor Magnetic Parts Trays each measure 4″ x 4″ with a strong rubber-covered non-marring magnet to protect surfaces from scratches. Perfect for holding screws, bolts, nuts, washers, small metal tools and parts to help keep you work area neat, clean, and organized.

This 3-Piece Parts Tray Set delivers both quality plus savings that you wouldn’t get from other Tool Organizers and Magnetic Screw Trays.

WHY YOU NEED THIS TOOL:

3 Piece Collapsible Parts Trays – Blue, Red & GreenEasy to Expand and CollapseStrong Non-Marring Magnet that Holds to Almost Any Metal SurfaceEasy to Clean High-Grade Silicone ConstructionTray Dimensions Measure 4.25″ x 4.25″Expands to 2″ Tall. ¾” When CollapsedStores Your Small Tools and Items with Ease

A Versatile & Useful Tool for Any Professional or Hobbyist!

COLLAPSIBLE MAGNETIC PARTS TRAYS: The Sandor Magnetic Parts Trays each measure 4.25″ x 4.25″ with a strong rubber-covered non-marring magnet to protect surfaces from scratches. Perfect for holding screws, bolts, nuts, washers, small metal tools and parts to help keep you work area neat, clean, and organized
3 COLORS – SAE | METRIC | TORX: Save space and neatly organize your workspace. Every order of Sandor Collapsible Parts Trays includes 1 blue, 1 red, and 1 green parts tray so that you can easily color code nuts, bolts, tools, sockets, wrenches and more. Now you will always be able to find what you need just when you need it!
EASY TO USE. EASY TO CLEAN: Easily expands to 2” and collapses down to only ¾”. The silicone design can be easily cleaned with soap and water. Strong magnetic base holds to most metal surfaces. Perfect for hobbyists, automotive, mechanics, engineers, plumbers, carpenters, machinists, HVAC & more
REAL TOOLS. REAL QUALITY: Our automotive and machinist hand tools are tough-as-nails. Made of high-grade silicone to ensure high strength, hardness, wear, and resistance for durability. The low-profile design allows for compact and easy storage
TRUSTED BRAND! WE STAND BY OUR PRODUCTS: When others talk quality, we deliver it. That’s why we always offer a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. At SANDOR Tool we only use the highest quality materials in our products, and we go the extra mile to stand by our tools. Your satisfaction is our priority. It’s that simple
